author: dantraMSFT
body:
Currently, there is no documentation about the format and usage of json file(s), what can be configured and the distinction between user and system-wide settings.

The document should call out what settings are valid in the user and system-wide files, their location, and a notation, for windows, what settings are overridden by group policy.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I think this issue should be in the PowerShell-Docs repo

title: Document powershell.config.json settings.
